name: Tokyo

description: The city that never sleeps, famous for its iconic skyline and diverse culture.

description: City of love and lights, renowned for its art, fashion, and romantic ambiance.

description: Ancient city with a mix of imperial history and modern architecture.

name: Rome
description: Eternal City known for its ancient ruins, art, and delicious cuisine.

description: Spectacular coastal city famous for its carnival, beaches, and vibrant energy.

description: Harbor city with iconic landmarks, beautiful beaches, and a relaxed lifestyle.

description: Bustling metropolis and Bollywood hub with a mix of tradition and modernity.

description: Dynamic city showcasing modern skyscrapers, historic sites, and cultural attractions.

name: Los Angeles
description: Entertainment capital with Hollywood glamour, beaches, and diverse neighborhoods.

name: Berlin
description: Cultural hub known for its history, art scene, and vibrant nightlife.

name: Cairo
description: Historic city on the Nile known for its ancient pyramids, Sphinx, and vibrant bazaars.

name: Toronto

name: Istanbul
description: City straddling two continents, known for its historic architecture and vibrant markets.
